scripts.serve: concurrently --kill-others "sleep 5; cd api && npm run serve" "cd app && rm -rf dist && npm run serve"
scripts.build: concurrently --kill-others "sleep 5; cd api && npm run serve" "cd app && rm -rf dist && npm run build"
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "sleep 5; cd api && npm run serve" "cd app && rm -rf dist && npm run build-dev"
